mapper.select: /* AuthMapper.selectAdminUser */ select ad.admin_id as user_id , ad.role_id as user_type , ad.dept_id , ad.password as password , ad.admin_nm as user_name , ad.email , ad.phone from tb_admin ad join tb_admin_role ro on ad.role_id = ro.role_id join tb_admin_dept de on ad.dept_id = de.dept_id where ad.admin_id = #{adminId}
